trans-unit.source: Represents the results of compilation that are returned from a compiler.
trans-unit.target: 表示從編譯器傳回的編譯結果。

trans-unit.source: This class contains the following information about the results of a compilation by an <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler> interface implementation:
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含下列有關使用編譯的結果<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeCompiler>介面實作：

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A> property indicates the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A>屬性表示編譯的組件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Evidence%2A> property indicates the security evidence for the assembly.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Evidence%2A>屬性會指出組件的安全性辨識項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.PathToAssembly%2A> property indicates the path to the compiled assembly, if it was not generated only in memory.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.PathToAssembly%2A>屬性會表示編譯的組件的路徑，如果它不只在記憶體中產生。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Errors%2A> property indicates any compiler errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Errors%2A>屬性會指出任何編譯器錯誤和警告。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Output%2A> property contains the compiler output messages.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.Output%2A>屬性包含編譯器輸出訊息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.NativeCompilerReturnValue%2A> property indicates result code value returned by the compiler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.NativeCompilerReturnValue%2A>屬性會指出由編譯器所傳回的結果程式碼值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.TempFiles%2A> property indicates the temporary files generated during compilation and linking.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.TempFiles%2A>屬性會指出在編譯和連結期間產生的暫存檔案。

trans-unit.source: This class contains an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別包含在類別層級套用至所有成員的繼承要求。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the derived class does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Security.SecurityException>衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。

trans-unit.source: For details about inheritance demands, see [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: 如需繼承要求的詳細資訊，請參閱[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for inheritors.
trans-unit.target: 針對繼承者完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承，部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 可用來管理與儲存在編譯期間產生的中繼檔案的參考。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> class that uses the specified temporary files.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體會使用指定的暫存檔案。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已編譯的組件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" /> that indicates the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Reflection.Assembly" />，表示已編譯的組件。

trans-unit.source: The `get` accessor for the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A> property calls the <xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A> method to load the compiled assembly into the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: `get`存取子<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerResults.CompiledAssembly%2A>屬性呼叫<xref:System.AppDomain.Load%2A>方法編譯的組件載入目前應用程式定義域。

trans-unit.source: After calling the `get` accessor, the compiled assembly cannot be deleted until the current <xref:System.AppDomain> is unloaded.
trans-unit.target: 在呼叫`get`存取子，編譯的組件無法刪除目前直到<xref:System.AppDomain>卸載。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of compiler errors and warnings.
trans-unit.target: 取得編譯器錯誤和警告的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection" /> that indicates the errors and warnings resulting from compilation, if any.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerErrorCollection" />，表示編譯的錯誤和警告結果 (如果有)。

trans-unit.source: File and line number information is associated with each <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>, so that user code to locate and display the code that generated an error or warning, where possible, can be implemented.
trans-unit.target: 檔案和行號資訊是與每個相關聯<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError>，如此一來，可以實作以尋找並顯示其程式碼產生錯誤或警告，可能的話，使用者程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the evidence object that represents the security policy permissions of the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: 表示代表已編譯組件之安全性原則權限的辨識項物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> object that represents the security policy permissions of the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Policy.Evidence" /> 物件表示已編譯組件的安全性原則權限。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

trans-unit.source: for the ability to control evidence.
trans-unit.target: 提供控制辨識項的能力。

trans-unit.source: Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" /> Security action: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />
trans-unit.target: 權限的值：<see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.ControlEvidence" />安全性動作： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the compiler's return value.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定編譯器的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: The compiler's return value.
trans-unit.target: 編譯器的傳回值。

trans-unit.source: This property contains the numeric exit code returned by a command line compiler, if implemented.
trans-unit.target: 如果實作此屬性會包含命令列編譯器時，所傳回的數字的結束代碼。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0 indicates success, while a non-zero value indicates failure.
trans-unit.target: 值為 0 表示成功，而非零值表示失敗。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets the compiler output messages.
trans-unit.target: 取得編譯器輸出訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> that contains the output messages.
trans-unit.target: 含有輸出訊息的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />。

trans-unit.source: If the compiler returned no messages, the value of this property will be an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: 如果編譯器不傳回任何訊息，這個屬性的值會是空的集合。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path of the compiled assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定已編譯組件的路徑。

trans-unit.source: The path of the assembly, or <see langword="null" /> if the assembly was generated in memory.
trans-unit.target: 若在記憶體中產生組件，則為組件的路徑或 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the temporary file collection to use.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要使用的暫存檔案集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> with which to manage and store references to intermediate files generated during compilation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection" /> 可用來管理與儲存在編譯期間產生的中繼檔案的參考。

trans-unit.source: for full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。
